code: import axios from'axios';import{getItemSession}from'../utils';export var http=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'}});export var isExpired=function isExpired(ret){return ret.Codigo==500&&ret.CodigoInterno==4;};export var HTTP_TOKEN=getItemSession('_token');export var REJECT_MSG='Sessao expirou';
